game.name: Knight in Love
game.description: The princess was arrested by the dragon. Knight needs to rescue his lover the princess. Now you control the knight to whack the castle and collect gold and diamonds to update his weapons and equipment. Press and tap the screen to move and update.
game.metaTitle: Knight in Love,  Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
